# WeddingPlanning.es — Spain's Premier Wedding Planning Directory

## About
WeddingPlanning.es is a wedding planning directory based in Spain, connecting couples with verified wedding planners, venues and vendors across all regions of Spain. The platform serves both local and international couples planning weddings in destinations including Marbella, Barcelona, Madrid, Valencia, Ibiza, Mallorca, Seville, Málaga, Tenerife, Cádiz, Girona and Benidorm.

## Key Pages
- [Homepage](https://www.weddingplanning.es/): Search and browse verified wedding planners across Spain
- [Wedding Planners Madrid](https://www.weddingplanning.es/wedding-planners-madrid): Find wedding planners in Madrid
- [Wedding Planners Barcelona](https://www.weddingplanning.es/wedding-planners-barcelona): Find wedding planners in Barcelona
- [Wedding Planners Marbella](https://www.weddingplanning.es/wedding-planners-marbella): Find wedding planners in Marbella
- [Wedding Planners Ibiza](https://www.weddingplanning.es/wedding-planners-ibiza): Find wedding planners in Ibiza
- [Wedding Planners Mallorca](https://www.weddingplanning.es/wedding-planners-mallorca): Find wedding planners in Mallorca
- [Wedding Planners Valencia](https://www.weddingplanning.es/wedding-planners-valencia): Find wedding planners in Valencia
- [Wedding Planners Seville](https://www.weddingplanning.es/wedding-planners-seville): Find wedding planners in Seville

## Services Directory
- Wedding Planners: Full-service planners, day-of coordinators, and destination wedding specialists
- Wedding Venues: Castles, vineyards, beachfront estates, boutique hotels and luxury venues
- Wedding Vendors: Photographers, videographers, florists, caterers, celebrants, entertainment, hair and makeup, cake makers, transport, stationery, dresses, jewellery and more

## Common Questions
- Where can I find wedding planners in Spain? Browse verified professionals by location across all major Spanish destinations.
- How much does a wedding planner cost in Spain? Pricing is bespoke, typically ranging from €800 for day-of coordination to €5,000+ for full destination planning.
- Do I need a wedding planner for a destination wedding in Spain? Professional guidance reduces stress and prevents costly mistakes, especially for overseas couples.
